author: Jerry "The Professor" Thomas
description: This brandy-influenced Sweet Manhattan is best mixed by throwing and enjoyed when the odd bubble still rests on its surface.
name: Saratoga Cocktail
recipeIngredient: 30 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)

recipeInstructions.text: THROW (or stir) all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
